com.jswiff.swfrecords.tags
Class DefineText

java.lang.Object
  com.jswiff.swfrecords.tags.Tag
      com.jswiff.swfrecords.tags.DefinitionTag
          com.jswiff.swfrecords.tags.DefineText
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public final class DefineText
extends DefinitionTag

This tag defines a block of static text. The bounding box of the text as well as a transform matrix can be specified. The actual text characters their style and position is defined in an array of TextRecord instances.

Since:
SWF 1
See Also:
TextRecord, DefineText2, Serialized Form

Constructor Summary
DefineText(int characterId, Rect textBounds, Matrix textMatrix, TextRecord[] textRecords)
          Creates a new DefineText tag.
 
Method Summary
 Rect getTextBounds()
          Returns the bounding box of the text, i.e. the smallest rectangle enclosing the text.

          Returns the transform matrix of the text.

Constructor Detail

DefineText

public DefineText(int characterId,
                  Rect textBounds,
                  Matrix textMatrix,
                  TextRecord[] textRecords)
Creates a new DefineText tag. Supply text character ID, bounding box and transform matrix. Specify text characters, their style and position in an TextRecord array.

Parameters:
characterId - text character ID
textBounds - bounding box of text
textMatrix - transform matrix for text
textRecords - TextRecord array containing text characters
